Rockford.Kishwaukee River:
The Kishwaukee River, locally known as simply "The Kish", is a 63.4-mile-long (102.0 km) river in the U.S. state of Illinois.


== Location ==
The Kishwaukee River flows from Woodstock, Illinois to Rockford, Illinois where it is a tributary to the Rock River. The river begins as a small wetland stream off Route 47, just south of the Route 14 intersection in Woodstock.
